ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: Application Schema, Area Management, Restriction/Regulation Zones and Reporting Units
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines requirements associated with the application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance Class 'Application schema, Area Management, Restriction/Regulation Zones and Reporting Units'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Area Management, Restriction/Regulation Zones and Reporting Units'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Code list values
TestCase.description:
Verify whether all attributes whose value type is a code list take the values set out therein.

Source: Code list values

TestAssertion.label: am-as.1: EnvironmentalDomain code list value
TestAssertion.description: Check code list value for environmentalDomain
TestAssertion.expression: let $codelist := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/EnvironmentalDomain' let $codelisturl := 'https://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/EnvironmentalDomain/EnvironmentalDomain.en.xml' let $valid_href := fn:doc($codelisturl)/*:codelist/*:containeditems/*:value/@id let $features_selected := $features[self::am:ManagementRestrictionOrRegulationZone] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $envDoms := $feature/am:environmentalDomain return if(not($envDoms)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'environmentalDomain'}) else for $envDom in $envDoms return if(not($envDom/@xlink:href)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingAttribute', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'environmentalDomain', 'attribute': 'xlink:href'}) else if(not($envDom/@xlink:href = $valid_href)) then local:addMessage('TR.disallowedCodeListValue', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'environmentalDomain', 'value': string($envDom/@xlink:href), 'codelist': $codelist}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: Constraints
TestCase.description:
Verify that the features provided in the dataset adhere to the constraints specified in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Constraints

TestAssertion.label: am-as.2.1: Constraint for legalBasis
TestAssertion.description: Check that at least the most specific legal instrument that required the establishment of zone is provided using the legalBasis association role.
TestAssertion.expression: let $features_selected := $features[self::am:ManagementRestrictionOrRegulationZone] let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $validLegalBasis := for $x in $feature/am:legalBasis return if($x/@xlink:href) then if(not($x/@xlink:href = "")) then $x else () else if ($x/base2:LegislationCitation) then $x else () return if(not($feature/am:legalBasis)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'legalBasis'}) else if(not($validLegalBasis)) then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType': local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'At least one valid am:LegalBasis shall be provided with attribute xlink:href or with a child element base2:LegislationCitation.', 'additionalInfo':''}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED_MANUAL', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), if ($messages) then $messages else for $feature in $features_selected return local:addMessage('TR.checkManualLegalBasis', map {'filename': local:filename($feature)}) )

TestAssertion.label: am-as.2.2: Constraint for competentAuthority
TestAssertion.description: Check that the role attribute of the competentAuthority takes the value "authority"
TestAssertion.expression: let $features_selected := $features[self::am:ManagementRestrictionOrRegulationZone] let $valid_href := 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/RelatedPartyRoleValue/authority' let $messages := for $feature in $features_selected let $validCompetentAuth := for $x in $feature/am:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:role/@xlink:href return if($x = $valid_href) then $x else () return if(not($feature/am:competentAuthority)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'competentAuthority'}) else if(not($feature/am:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:role)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingElement', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'competentAuthority/RelatedParty/role'}) else if(not($feature/am:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:role/@xlink:href)) then local:addMessage('TR.missingAttribute', map {'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType':local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@*:id), 'property': 'competentAuthority/RelatedParty/role', 'attribute': 'xlink:href'}) else if(not($validCompetentAuth)) then local:addMessage('TR.constraintViolation', map { 'filename': local:filename($feature), 'featureType': local-name($feature), 'gmlid': string($feature/@gml:id), 'constraint': 'At least one am:competentAuthority with role authority (http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/codelist/RelatedPartyRoleValue/authority) shall be provided.', 'additionalInfo':''}) else () return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
